1375540.name: Omno: Prologue
1375540.description:
Omno: Prologue is a standalone mini-adventure set in the world of Omno. Intended as an introduction to the world of Omno, this prologue will introduce you to some of the game’s mechanics, creatures and ideas, but is completely separate to the main game, coming Spring 2021.



Omno whisks you away on a journey of discovery through an ancient world of wonders. A single-player adventure full of puzzles, secrets and obstacles to overcome, where the power of a lost civilisation will carry you through forests, deserts and tundras - even to the clouds.

  • A gentle yet emotional single player journey
  • Discover and explore a beautiful, mysterious world
  • Strange and fantastical creatures to befriend
  • Challenging puzzles and ancient secrets to uncover
  • Lovingly crafted by solo developer Jonas Manke over 5 years

About the developer
Jonas Manke, solo developer and father of 3, began work on Omno as a hobby project 5 years ago after working as an animator in both games and movies.
1375540.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
